While we did catch a notable deal on this one over Prime Day at $56, and a digital only offer at the same rate, today’s Amazon all-time low is ushering in the best price to date on the new Borderlands release. 

Alongside the Borderlands 4 deal, Amazon has now launched countdown clocks on several of its big hangover Prime Day PS5 game deals – today looks to be your last chance:
